short_summary: one lisecting mousecope and camera system
description: The supplied dissecting microscope and camera system must include all computer parts, equipment, software, and manuals required for control and optimization of the system to examine and photograph (still and videos) small freshwater invertebrates (approx. size range 0.2-30 mm). The Contractor must deliver, assemble, install, connect, and test the system components at the time of installation.
